front.title: •An Entire Legion Of My Best Troops
front.gametext: Deploy on your side of table. Stormtroopers (except biker scouts) have armor = 4. Also, your blaster rifles, Stormtrooper Utility Belts and Blaster Scopes are deploy -1 and are destiny +2 when drawn for weapon or battle destiny. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Stormtrooper standard gear includes plastoid composite armor, utility belt, positive-grip boots and energy sinks to dissipate blaster fire.

pulledBy: You Cannot Hide Forever & Mobilization Points
